item.title: Prepare Storage Node
item.description: Prepare Storage Node Description Prepare a storage node before rebuilding it. IMPORTANT: All of the output examples may not reflect the cluster status where this operation is being performed. For example, if this is a rebuild in place then ceph components will not be reporting down, versus a failed node rebuild. Prequisites If rebuilding ncn-s001, it is critical that the storage-ceph-cloudinit.sh has been removed from the runcmd in bss. Get the xname for ncn-s001.
